title: Log printout in Lost television show
content:
stupid question, quick answer.  
On the show, there is a printout showing the time stamp when the “button” was pressed and the system failure when Desmond missed it and the plain crashed. What is the font used?  
Thanks

 [‹ (x) Slab serif magazine heads - Soho {Marc O}](http://web.archive.org/web/20071230061006/http:/typophile.com/node/40353 "Go to previous forum topic") [Looking for a free alternative to Nyx ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071230061006/http:/typophile.com/node/40302 "Go to next forum topic")
author: b84

comments.content:
also, what is the font used to display the user name in the account section on this site.  
Sorry for stupid q’s but what can I do.

Can you post a sample?

The font used for the titles on the site is always listed at the right under “Featured Face” —\> Right now it’s FF Meta Serif.

- Lex

There are 2 screenshots on this page: [http://www.lostpedia.com/wiki/Log\_printout](http://web.archive.org/web/20071230061006/http:/www.lostpedia.com/wiki/Log_printout "http://www.lostpedia.com/wiki/Log\_printout")  
I suppose it’s how silentype printers printed, but is there such a font I can download.  
Thanks, bro.

Further information about the Lost fonts can be found [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20071230061006/http:/www.typophile.com/node/17398), [here](http://web.archive.org/) and [here](http://web.archive.org/www.typophile.com/node/39066)
Search for “screen matrix”, “dot matrix” and “matrix” on FontShop.com and MyFonts.com
